item.description:
It's more than time to get together again and welcome several new members!

For this event I am experimenting with requesting a contribution (via MeetUp preferably as I need to have a budget to pre-order 4 days in advance). It will be wine, tapas and casual networking.

Since we last met I spent time trying to understand how to best run our meetings, identify formats that work and grow our group by talking to other InterFrench groups (Quebec in particular).

This led me to design a survey in collaboration with the French Consulate and the French-American Chamber of Commerce to understand the needs of the local French community.

If you are French please take a few minutes to answer the questions. It will be key in identifying projects we can put in place (like a "talent connector" or events that really fit the needs):

http://questionnaire2...

We will present the results in a future meeting. It is likely that I'll send a similar survey for francophiles, once this one is processed.

See you soon!

Gilberte

Director, InterFrench Boston Chapter

ps: The hotel validates parking but you should call them for details. There is metered parking and around 6pm usually more spots become available.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the InterFrench meeting in the cafe area
item.name: Time for another meeting !
